name: VZMACAddress
desc: The media access control (MAC) address for a network interface in your virtual machine.

items.name: class func randomLocallyAdministered() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a valid, random, locally administered, unicast MAC address.

items.name: init?(string: String)
items.desc: Creates a MAC address object from a specially formatted string.

items.name: init(ethernetAddress: ether_addr_t)
items.desc: Creates a MAC address from the specified 48-bit Ethernet address.

items.name: var string: String
items.desc: The MAC address as a formatted string.

items.name: var ethernetAddress: ether_addr_t
items.desc: The MAC address as an Ethernet data structure.

items.name: var isBroadcastAddress: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the address is a broadcast address.

items.name: var isMulticastAddress: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the address is a multicast address.

items.name: var isUnicastAddress: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the address is a unicast address.

items.name: var isLocallyAdministeredAddress: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the address is a locally administered address (LAA).

items.name: var isUniversallyAdministeredAddress: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the address is a universally adminstered address (UAA).
